statements: SELECT * FROM CustomerLifetimeValue ORDER BY total_purchase_amount DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, lifetime_value FROM CustomerLifetimeValue WHERE total_orders > 5;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, email FROM CustomerLifetimeValue WHERE lifetime_value > 1000;
SELECT last_name, first_name, total_orders FROM CustomerLifetimeValue ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, total_purchase_amount FROM CustomerLifetimeValue WHERE total_purchase_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT * FROM CustomerLifetimeValue WHERE total_purchase_amount > 1000 ORDER BY lifetime_value DESC
SELECT email, first_name, last_name FROM CustomerLifetimeValue WHERE total_purchase_amount < 500 ORDER BY total_purchase_amount ASC
SELECT first_name, last_name, lifetime_value FROM CustomerLifetimeValue WHERE total_orders >= 3 ORDER BY first_name, last_name
SELECT customer_id, email FROM CustomerLifetimeValue WHERE lifetime_value < 500 ORDER BY customer_id DESC
SELECT first_name, total_purchase_amount, lifetime_value FROM CustomerLifetimeValue WHERE total_purchase_amount > 5000 ORDER BY lifetime_value
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, total_spent FROM customers WHERE total_spent > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, total_orders FROM customers ORDER BY total_orders DESC;
SELECT customer_name, total_spent FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT transaction_id, order_date, order_total FROM transactions ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE total_spent > 1000 ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, total_spent, total_orders FROM customers WHERE total_orders >= 5 ORDER BY total_orders ASC, total_spent DESC;
SELECT customer_name, total_spent, order_total FROM customers JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id WHERE order_total > 500 ORDER BY total_spent DESC;

SELECT customer_name, total_orders, order_total FROM customers JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY order_date ASC;

SELECT customer_name, SUM(order_total) AS total_spent FROM customers JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name HAVING SUM(order_total) > 2000 ORDER BY total_spent DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, lifetime_value FROM customers WHERE lifetime_value > 1000;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products ORDER BY product_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, lifetime_value FROM customers WHERE lifetime_value > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, order_date, order_total FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id;

SELECT customer_name, product_name, product_price FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id JOIN products ON orders.product_id = products.product_id ORDER BY product_price ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_age, customer_address FROM customers;
SELECT order_id, order_date, order_total FROM orders;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products;
SELECT transaction_id, product_id, quantity FROM transactions;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC, customer_age ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_name, customer_address FROM customers WHERE customer_age > 30 AND customer_email LIKE '%gmail.com%';
SELECT order_id, order_date, order_total FROM orders WHERE order_total > 1000 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products WHERE product_category = 'Electronics' AND product_price BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, product_name, quantity, transaction_date FROM transactions JOIN products ON transactions.product_id = products.product_id ORDER BY transaction_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, lifetime_value FROM customers JOIN customer_lifetime_value ON customers.customer_id = customer_lifetime_value.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_date, total_amount FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id WHERE purchase_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE signup_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, total_amount FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id;
SELECT segment_name, lifetime_value FROM customer_segments JOIN customer_lifetime_value ON customer_segments.segment_id = customer_lifetime_value.customer_id;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
